00037 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 CvPoint3D32f FloorRegion::GetCenter() {
00039         CvPoint3D32f c = cvPoint3D32f(0,0,0);
00040         for (int i=0;i<p.GetCount();i++) {
00041                 c.x += p[i].x;
00042                 c.y += p[i].y;
00043         }
00044         c.x /= p.GetCount();
00045         c.y /= p.GetCount();
00046         return c;
00047 }
00048 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 bool FloorRegion::IsRealPointIn(CvPoint2D32f point) {
00050         return cvPointInPoly(point, p);
00051 }
00052 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 void FloorRegion::AddBorder(int w) {
00054         // Add border of w (cm); Parallel shift each edge by w - this will create N new vertices
00055         // Solve system of two equations: (1) - line v1 to v2 and (2) - distance from |v3-v1|=w
00056         // to find point [x3, y3]
00057         CArray<CvPoint2D32f> arrNew;
00058         int N = p.GetCount();
00059         CvPoint3D32f c3 = GetCenter();
00060         CvPoint2D32f c = cvPoint2D32f(c3.x, c3.y);
00061 
00062         for (int i=0;i<N;i++) {
00063                 CvPoint2D32f a1, b1, a2, b2;
00064                 pointAtD2line(w, p[i], p[(i+1)%N], a1, b1);
00065                 pointAtD2line(w, p[(i+1)%N], p[i], a2, b2);
00066 
00067                 // which one: b1 or b2? must be outside the polygon
00068                 CvPoint2D32f v1 = cvPoint2D32f(a1.x-p[i].x, a1.y-p[i].y);
00069                 CvPoint2D32f vc1 = cvPoint2D32f(p[i].x-c.x, p[i].y-c.y);
00070                 CvPoint2D32f v2 = cvPoint2D32f(a2.x-p[(i+1)%N].x, a2.y-p[(i+1)%N].y);
00071                 CvPoint2D32f vc2 = cvPoint2D32f(p[(i+1)%N].x-c.x, p[(i+1)%N].y-c.y);
00072                 double d1 = dotProduct(v1, vc1);
00073                 double d2 = dotProduct(v2, vc2);
00074                 double d3 = d(p[i], c);
00075                 double d4 = d(a1, p[i]);
00076                 double d5 = d(b1, p[i]);
00077                 // add only vertices that are on outward pointing rays
00078                 if (dotProduct(v1, vc1) > 0) {
00079                         arrNew.Add(a1);  arrNew.Add(b2);   }
00080                 else {
00081                         arrNew.Add(b1); arrNew.Add(a2);  }
00082                 //if (dotProduct(v2, vc2))
00083                 //      arrNew.Add(a2);  
00084                 //else
00085                 //      arrNew.Add(b2); 
00086 
00087         }
00088         p.RemoveAll();
00089         p.Copy(arrNew);
00090 }
00091 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 void FloorRegion::DrawFrame(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00093         //cvCircle(frame, cvPoint(x, y), 3, color, -1);
00094         int nPts = p.GetSize();
00095         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nPts];
00096         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00097                 pts[i] = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(p[i].x, p[i].y, 0)));
00098         }
00099         // Draw a smoothed poly-line
00100         cvPolyLine(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, 1, color, 1, CV_AA);
00101         delete pts;
00102         return;
00103 }

00105 void FloorRegion::DrawFrame(CDC* pDC , int ox, int oy, CPen* pen) {
00106         CPen pNew(PS_SOLID, 1, RGB(0, 0, 255));
00107         CPen* pOldPen = pDC->SelectObject(&pNew);

00111                 CvPoint2D32f pp = doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(p[i].x, p[i].y, 0));
00112                 pts[i] = CPoint((int)(pp.x - ox), (int)(pp.y - oy));

00147 void FloorRegion::DrawFloor(CDC* pDC, int ox, int oy, CPen* pen) {      
00148         CPen pNew(PS_SOLID, 1, RGB(0, 0, 255));
00149         CPen* pOldPen = pDC->SelectObject(&pNew);
00150         CBrush bNew(RGB(0, 255, 0));
00151         CBrush* pOldBrush = pDC->SelectObject(&bNew);
00152         int nPts = p.GetSize();
00153         CPoint *pts = new CPoint[nPts];
00154         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00155                 CvPoint pp = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(cvPoint3D32f(p[i].x, p[i].y, 0));
00156                 pts[i] = CPoint((int)(pp.x - ox), (int)(pp.y - oy));
00157         }
00158         // Draw a smoothed poly-line
00159         pDC->Polyline(pts, nPts);
00160         pDC->MoveTo(pts[nPts-1]);
00161         pDC->LineTo(pts[0]);
00162         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00163         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00164                 pDC->Ellipse(pts[i].x-DOT, pts[i].y-DOT, pts[i].x+DOT, pts[i].y+DOT);
00165         }
00166 
00167         // Cleanup
00168         pDC->SelectObject(pOldBrush);
00169         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00170         delete pts;
00171 }

00173 void FloorRegion::DrawFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {  
00174         int nPts = p.GetSize();
00175         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nPts];
00176         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00177                 pts[i] = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(cvPoint3D32f(p[i].x, p[i].y, 0));
00178         }
00179         // Draw a smoothed poly-line
00180         cvPolyLine(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, 1, color, 4, CV_AA);
00181         delete pts;
00182 }

00186 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00187 void FloorRegion::RasterizeFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00188         int nPts = p.GetSize();
00189         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nPts];
00190         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00191                 pts[i] = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(cvPoint3D32f(p[i].x, p[i].y, 0));
00192         }
00193         cvFillPoly(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, color); // fill frame with color 
00194         delete pts;
00195 }

00197 void FloorRegion::Serialize( CArchive& archive ) {
00198         if( archive.IsStoring() ) {
00199                 archive << id << label << m_regionType << nInVertices;
00200         }
00201         else {
00202                 archive >> id >> label >> m_regionType >> nInVertices;
00203         }
00204         p.Serialize(archive);
00205 }
